Book
It Australia
April 26, 1923.
Dr. H. R. Carter,
Assistant Surgeon General,
2121 California St., N.W.,
Washington, D.C.
My dear sir:-
div1.p:
Your letter of April 18th, to
Dr. E.C. Houle, was received by me during
his absence from the office. Dr. Houle left
a few days ago for Guadalajara and will not
return to Empalme for at least two weeks,
when your letter will be called to his
attention for immediate reply.

Regretting the necessity for delay,
I am,
div1.closer:
Yours very truly, B M Richards
For and In the absence of Chief Surgeon Dr. E.C.Houle,
Chief Surgeon, S,P, de M. R. R.,
Empalme, Son., Mex.
